li.label: techno-ghost
li.description: For some strange reason, {PAWN_nameDef} is not touched by ancient mechanoids, they constantly ignore [PAWN_objective] no matter what {PAWN_nameDef} takes against them.

li.label: shiftphobe
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is afraid of shapeshift; just the thought of a sudden and complete transformation gives [PAWN_objective] goosebumps. [PAWN_pronoun] will never use shapeshifting.

li.label: psychic shift
li.description:
[PAWN_nameDef] has a special psychic sensitivity, [PAWN_pronoun] is a little nervous and is especially susceptible to archites. This susceptibility may have unexpected effects on some genes.
<color=#f5ffa2>Note:</color> [PAWN_nameDef] cannot use the shapeshift ability of the gene of the same name. However, [PAWN_nameDef] can create clones of [PAWN_objective]self.
